bill.title: Health care certificates of need; issue for construction of PRTF and child acute care beds in certain counties.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 41-7-191, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize The State Department Of Health To Issue A Certificate Of Need For The Construction Or Expansion Of 30 Psychiatric Residential Treatment (prtf) Beds In Rankin County, A Certificate Of Need For The Construction Or Expansion Of 30 Psychiatric Residential Treatment (prtf) Beds In Winston County, A Certificate Of Need For The Construction Or Expansion Of 30 Psychiatric Residential Treatment (prtf) Beds In Lauderdale County, A Certificate Of Need For The Construction Or Expansion Of 20 Child/adolescent Acute Care Beds In Lauderdale County, And To Provide That 20 Child/adolescent Acute Care Beds Authorized In Winston County Are Eligible For Participation In The Medicaid Program; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Health and Welfare;Appropriations
